body_html: I have a question about using torch.nn.utils.rrn.pack_padded_sequence( input, lengths, batch_first). When using this function, the input sequences should be sorted by length in a decreasing order, as well as the length. What if I want to keep the original order of sequences in the order? Can this function support the input which is not sorted by length in a decreasing order?

body: I have a question about using `torch.nn.utils.rrn.pack_padded_sequence( input, lengths, batch_first)`. When using this function, the input sequences should be sorted by length in a decreasing order, as well as the length. What if I want to keep the original order of sequences in the order? Can this function support the input which is not sorted by length in a decreasing order?
